verses.verse: Let us <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5399>fear,<s%> <S%G3379>lest,<s%> a <S%G1860>promise<s%> being <S%G2641>left<s%> us of <S%G1525>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2663>rest,<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> should <S%G1380>seem<s%> to come <S%G5302>short<s%> of it.

For <S%G1063><s%> unto <S%G2532>us<s%> was the gospel <S%G2070>preached,<s%> <S%G2097><s%> as well <S%G2509>as<s%> unto <S%G2548>them:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G189>preached<s%> did <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5623>profit<s%> <S%G1565>them,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> being mixed <S%G4786>with<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in them that <S%G191>heard<s%> it.

For <S%G1063><s%> we which have <S%G4100>believed<s%> do <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2663>rest,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G2046>said,<s%> <S%G5613>As<s%> I have <S%G3660>sworn<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> they shall <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2663>rest:<s%> <S%G2543>although<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> were <S%G1096>finished<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G2046>spake<s%> in a certain <S%G4225>place<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1442>seventh<s%> day on this <S%G3779>wise,<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> did <S%G2664>rest<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%>

Seeing <S%G1893><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> it <S%G620>remaineth<s%> that <S%G5100>some<s%> must <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>therein,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they to whom it was first <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G4386><s%> entered not <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of unbelief: <S%G543><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> he <S%G3724>limiteth<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1138>David,<s%> <S%G4594>Today,<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> so <S%G5118>long<s%> a <S%G5550>time;<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G2046>said,<s%> <S%G4594>Today<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> ye will <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G4645>harden<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2424>Joshua<s%> had given them <S%G2664>rest,<s%> <S%G846><s%> then would he <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3326>afterward<s%> <S%G5023><s%> have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he that is <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2663>rest,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> hath <S%G2664>ceased<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> did <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2398>his.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2198>quick,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1756>powerful,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5114>sharper<s%> <S%G5228>than<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G1366>two-edged<s%> <S%G3162>sword,<s%> <S%G1338>piercing<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G891>to<s%> the dividing <S%G3311>asunder<s%> <S%G5037>of<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> of the <S%G719>joints<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3452>marrow,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is a <S%G2924>discerner<s%> of the <S%G1761>thoughts<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1771>intents<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart.<s%>

Neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> there any <S%G2937>creature<s%> that is not <S%G852>manifest<s%> in his <S%G1799>sight:<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1131>naked<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5136>opened<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have to <S%G2254>do.<s%> <S%G3056><s%>

Seeing <S%G3767>then<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> high <S%G749>priest,<s%> that is passed <S%G1330>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heavens,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> let us hold <S%G2902>fast<s%> our <S%G3671>profession.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a high <S%G749>priest<s%> which <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3361><s%> be touched with the feeling <S%G4834>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G769>infirmities;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> was <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>points<s%> <S%G3985>tempted<s%> like <S%G2596>as<s%> <S%G3665><s%> we are, yet <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>

Let us <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4334>come<s%> <S%G3326>boldly<s%> <S%G3954><s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G2983>obtain<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to help in time of <S%G1519>need.<s%> <S%G2121><s%> <S%G996><s%>
